Artemis, taking center stage

Since the introduction of Artemis in April 2017, developers and designers alike have been working to keep Unity 7 alive. Now, Artemis may get the biggest change ever that completely rethinks the desktop since its inception in 2011, bringing about a new design and codebase for the next 20 years of future coders.

Learn more
